pkgmetadata.longdescription: # kgdata ![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/kgdata) ![Documentation](https://readthedocs.org/projects/kgdata/badge/?version=latest&style=flat)KGData is a library to process dumps of Wikipedia, Wikidata. What it can do:- Clean up the dumps to ensure the data is consistent (resolve redirect, remove dangling references)- Create embedded key-value databases to access entities from the dumps.- Extract Wikidata ontology.- Extract Wikipedia tables and convert the hyperlinks to Wikidata entities.- Create Pyserini indices to search Wikidataâ€™s entities.- and moreFor a full documentation, please see [the website](https://kgdata.readthedocs.io/).## InstallationFrom PyPI (using pre-built binaries):```bashpip install kgdata```
